text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Housing (Sale of Local 

Authority Houses) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 2. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 2015 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 2015 (S.I. 

484 of 2015) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 5 – 

(i) 

(ii) 

in paragraph (1), by substituting “ten years” for “one year”, 
and 

in paragraph (2), by substituting “both of the tenants” for 
“one of the tenants”, and 

(b) 

in Regulation 6, by substituting “€12,500” for “€15,000”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [776] 3

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. 484 of 2015) to – 

• provide that the minimum income criteria is reduced to €12,500, and 

• change the requirement for the duration of receipt of social housing 
support from 1 to 10 years and, in the case of joint applicants, apply the 
same requirement to the second applicant. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [776]
